## TransactableKumo.claimCollateralSurplus() method

Claim leftover collateral after a liquidation or redemption.

**Signature:**

```typescript
claimCollateralSurplus(asset: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  asset | string |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

Use [getCollateralSurplusBalance()](./lib-base.readablekumo.getcollateralsurplusbalance.md) to check the amount of collateral available for withdrawal.
